attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE 😠😤😤😡 DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it wasn’t working and when it started working and I opened the app my screen turned orange🍊and when I left the app my screen was still orange. Also when I deleted the app guess what! MY SCREEN WAS STILL ORANGE!!!!!! I do not recommend this app 🦋🧚🏻‍♂️🧚‍♀️🙊🦋🦄🦋🧚🏻‍♂️

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: as much as i LOVE having a racist, sexist, pedophilic geezer as a president this app is just horrible. It took days to download, and glitches when I open it. If you want to find a way to better connect with our POTUS I recommend twitter and reading his stimulating and well written tweets.

attributes.title: my life is ruined. 😤🤧😭💀
attributes.review: this app DESTROYED my family. never again will something so large, racist, and orange ever come between me or my loved ones again. do not download, it will come for yours too. i am absolutely disgusted. my life will never be the same due to the disgrace of this app. rude. ✌🏻😡

Horrible Absolutely the worst app I’ve ever downloaded and I’m not just saying that because I hate Trump and that he is a sick person I’m saying that because the app is just a very bad we made up and you just did it a little bit more money so Trump

attributes.title: Wort app ever.
attributes.review: This is the absolute worst app i have ever downloaded, it took days to download and messed up other data on my phone. The quality was complete crap and i hope the app store deletes it, I have never had a worse experience with an app.

attributes.title: DO NOT GET! SCAM!
attributes.review:
When I first got the app, right off the bat,  it asked for my social security and my address? I was very confused on why it would ask me that,,,, but i enters it anyways.

When I was roaming around the app, my screen all of sudden started glitching! It started popping up these paragraphs saying “r-r-r-roll💿up⬆️to2️⃣the🤩party🥳with🧶my🧚crazy🤪pink💝wig💇🏼‍♀️”!

I was so confused and scared, then, out of nowhere, it opened up the app called “Beat Blade” And started playing unravel????

i HAD to delete the app! don’t get this app what so ever!

attributes.title: absolute worst 😠😤
attributes.review: every time i open this app i get bombarded with ads, mostly nsfw. 😖😱 and i find that extremely inappropriate.😠 next thing, i try to use it and no matter what i click it directs me to some ugly what i can only assume to be spam, because it’s terrifying and absurdly orange. 😰🍊finally, once i get through the p*rn ads and constant spam, it loads and then the app closes itself and won’t open for several minutes afterward. ☹️ horrible horrible horrible app.😠😤😢🤬

attributes.title: Don’t even bother
attributes.review: This app is horrible. It took hours to download and then there was a picture of a big hairy orangutan on the home screen. I had to delete it because it throw up every time the app loads now. Don’t waste your time.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!
attributes.review: First of all, I don’t know why but the app literally took hours to download even though I have a lot of storage on my phone. Also, the app is filtered horribly and nothing makes any sense. Everything about the app is so boring and is below useless.
